title: How Solana and XRP Futures Became CME’s Fastest Growing Crypto Products
contentSnippet: CME’s Solana and XRP futures hit record notional open interest on Monday.

title: Anthropic’s AI Models Show Glimmers of Self-Reflection
contentSnippet: Anthropic’s Claude models showed early signs of self-awareness, detecting “injected thoughts" and both thrilling and unnerving researchers.

title: Treasury Dept.’s renderings of $1 Trump coin draws criticism from lawmakers over ties to TRUMP memecoin

title: Western Union Files Trademark for ‘WUUSD’ a Day After USDPT Stablecoin Reveal

title: Bodega Cat Allegedly Killed by Self-Driving Car Gets Second Life via Meme Coins
contentSnippet: A beloved liquor store cat named KitKat was allegedly killed by a Waymo—and meme coin traders are pumping Solana and BNB Chain tokens in its honor.

title: Stellar’s XLM Holds Steady at $0.2975 as Weak Volume Caps Rebound Momentum
contentSnippet: XLM consolidated near $0.2975 after a volatile session, underperforming the broader crypto market despite signs of accumulation near key support.

title: JPMorgan executes first fund-servicing transaction on its Kinexys blockchain
contentSnippet: The Kinexys system uses smart contracts to automate capital calls and reduce manual fund processes, building on an earlier onchain repo tool.

title: SUI Slides as Token Unlock Concerns Trigger Breakdown to as Low as $2.27
contentSnippet: A 160% spike in trading volume and stop-loss cascades drove the plunge, with SUI stabilizing just above key support amid mounting November supply concerns.

title: HBAR Declines 4% Following ETF Debut as Initial Euphoria Fades

title: Crypto Asset Manager Bitwise Makes Case for Solana’s Next Big Run
contentSnippet: Solana is well-positioned to capture a growing share of the stablecoin and tokenization boom, the investment firm said.

title: BNB Slips Below Support as Broader Crypto Market Reacts to Fed Chair's Remarks
contentSnippet: The Fed's 25 basis point rate cut and Chair Jerome Powell's cautious stance led to a wave of selling, with 24-hour liquidations surging to over $1.1 billion.

title: Bitcoin rewards app Lolli acquires Slice, accelerating its adoption of the Lightning Network
contentSnippet: Thesis-owner bitcoin rewards app Lolli has acquired the Slice browser extension, which rewards users for their passive internet activity.

title: Drake, Adin Ross Sued Over 'Deeply Fraudulent' Promotion of Crypto Casino Stake
contentSnippet: A class-action lawsuit accuses Drake and Adin Ross of making millions off misleading ads for Stake, a social casino alleged to be an illegal gambling operation.

title: JPMorgan Completes First Blockchain-Based Private Fund Transaction Amid Tokenization Push

title: Sam Altman-backed World’s ‘proof of human’ IDs coming to FIFA, NFL and Pudgy Penguins games

title: The Graph Builders, Edge & Node, Unveil “ampersend” Dashboard to Manage AI Agent Payments
contentSnippet: The founding team behind The Graph debuts a new platform to unify payments, policies, and visibility for autonomous agents.

title: Lombard Finance acquires BTC.b, Avalanche’s bridged bitcoin asset, from Ava Labs
contentSnippet: With both BTC.b and LBTC, Lombard is the only platform offering both yield and non-yield bitcoin assets, founder Jacob Phillips said.

title: Mythical Games Taps Sam Altman’s World to Keep Players Safe From Bots
contentSnippet: As part of the partnership, Mythical will build Mythos Chain, the first layer-3 blockchain atop World Chain, the layer-2 network built on top of Ethereum.

title: Social Engineering Scams Top Crypto Threats in 2025: WhiteBit
contentSnippet: Technical wallet hacks, including phishing and malware, are the second most common threat, making up 33.7% of incidents.

title: Bernstein initiates coverage on Ethereum treasury firm SharpLink with 75% upside target

title: Bernstein Initiates SharpLink Coverage With Outperform Rating for Ethereum Treasury

title: 1kx: Onchain Economy Hits $20B as Fees Signal Real Demand
contentSnippet: The firm’s Onchain Revenue Report (H1 2025) aggregates verified onchain data across more than 1,200 protocols, tracking how value actually moves through decentralized systems.

title: Core Scientific shareholder vote sinks $9 billion CoreWeave deal, halting merger of AI cloud and bitcoin miner
contentSnippet: CORZ holders rejecting the merger shows that bitcoin miners’ infrastructure is becoming a lucrative key to the AI data-center boom.

title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Bulls Get Rekt: Liquidations Top $1.1 Billion as Prices Fall After Trump Meets Xi
contentSnippet: President Trump hailed his meeting with China leader Xi Jinping as "amazing" and put a halt on tariffs. But markets aren't happy.

title: Elon Musk’s SpaceX Just Moved More of Its $894 Million in Bitcoin Holdings

title: Western Union files ‘WUUSD’ trademark after Solana stablecoin reveal

title: Solana offers ‘two ways to win’ as stablecoin and tokenization bets align, Bitwise CIO says

title: MegaETH’s public token sale oversubscribed by 27.8x as auction officially closes

title: Dare Me? This Solana Project Is Paying Out Crypto for Hilarious Stunts
contentSnippet: Branded as “the most unhinged platform on the internet,” Dare Markets has raised $2 million in funding to fuel wild stunts with crypto.

title: Character.AI Halts Teen Chats After Tragedies: 'It's the Right Thing to Do'
contentSnippet: Following months of lawsuits and regulatory heat, Character.AI will ban minors from its open-ended chat feature.
